credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman and David Byrne:  Stay up Late
description:
In this print version of the eponymous song by David Byrne, the narrator, an older sibling, describes the impact of a new baby's arrival on various family members. Maira Kalman's illustrations feature flat perspective, sharp angles and bright colors.
Reference: New York Public Library LEO catalog (nypl.org) - Karen K. Radtke, Milwaukee Public Library. Copyright 1988 Cahners Business Information, Inc.
name: Book
